_data.title: Getting started

Learn how to fetch your content with

_data.text:
Empower your NuxtJS application with `@nuxtjs/content` module: write in a `content/` directory and fetch your Markdown, JSON, YAML and CSV files through a MongoDB like API, acting as a **Git-based Headless CMS**.

## Writing content

Learn how to write your `content/`, supporting Markdown, YAML, CSV and JSON: https://content.nuxtjs.org/writing.

## Fetching content

Learn how to fetch your content with `$content`: https://content.nuxtjs.org/fetching.

## Displaying content

Learn how to display your Markdown content with the `<nuxt-content>` component directly in your template: https://content.nuxtjs.org/displaying.

question.content: Goth gf aside, i DO hope theres alot of fashion options in the final release,

answer.content: I'll be surprised if most people are displeased with the long-term fashion goals - we really want this to be a prime place for customization.

question.content: Q: will the songs of the game be available to the public in spotify or youtube??

answer.content: I'm not sure of any plans yet, but I would be surprised if we don't accommodate that later on.

question.content: Will I be able to make my character short? I know its just humans and elves but a goblin can dream <:einar_pleased:830131367164510229>

answer.content: Are you a fan of Goblin metal like me?

question.content: *last I heard* animal husbandry isn't in the pre-alpha yet but it's under consideration?

referenced_message.content: did any dev mention whether or not you can keep animals like chickens or ducks for eggs

answer.content: I think this is an accurate statement - whether we pursue it further or not will be based on overall feedback from players.

question.content:
"Our hope is that those who do get into pre-alpha are super vocal about the things that they like and the things that they don't like. Our goal at this stage in our development is to really double down on the things that players are loving about the game and fixing things that they see as problematic. Part of the reason why we are having the pre-alpha is so the game can be shaped not only by us, but by players as well." 
Me: I'm the most vocal person I know!
Boyfriend : "You are pretty vocal..." RUDEEEEE c nkjdfbn ased

statement.content: My personal preference is that you stay away from the word slave please.

question.content: What kind of game is this?
Hey Palia team im a Twich Stremer when we could have acces to the game ? can i pay to buy or somthing to get an eary acces as a stremer ?

answer.content: There is no way to buy yourself into pre-alpha.

question.content: So i know there is an NDA for streaming, but, is it allowed to stream it on disc with like 2 friends who also want to get into the game but were not let in?

answer.content: Nope, this will still be against the NDA.

question.content: damn, my whole guild basicly signed up and we were hoping for one of us to atleast get accepted so they could show it us, welp guess words will have to do for those poor sods <:LUL:555133071993733165>

answer.content: NDA also covers telling them about anything in the game.

statement.content: I think it needs to be called out that we have the NDA not only to protect the game, but also to ensure that we launch a game that hasn't been spoiled and that players are excited about. Anyone breaking NDA is effectively trying to hurt the long-term possibility for the game.

question.content: One thing I'm wondering is if you romance an NPC, does it offer any sort of benefit like a buff or something like that when you're in a relationship?

answer.content: There will be incentives for engaging with NPCs deeply -as to what explicitly, I'll leave that a mystery!

question.content: Q: follow up question, is the robot also an "engaging" npc?

referenced_message.content: There will be incentives for engaging with NPCs deeply -as to what explicitly, I'll leave that a mystery!

answer.content: Einar is an NPC that you can talk with deeply. 🙂

question.content: <@!593992404542029839> any idea yourself about the duration of the pre-alpha itself? i was actually wondering this as well

answer.content: Not explicitly known yet - long enough for players to be able to relay feedback and us to test our servers and configurations. When we do announce the actual pre-alpha start date there will be a better approximation, but everything is subject to change.

statement.content: $$ to switch all references in game from Chapaa to Chuu - we'll be rich!
I can not confirm anything about any monetization, but I'm enjoying everyone's conversation about things they like and dislike about certain monetization. 🙂

question.content: I've never seen a console player claim their platform is better than pc when anyone and their mother knows that is just entirely untrue.

referenced_message.content: Cross platform is bad because console players are cringey and make a big deal out of consoles being the best

answer.content: Hey who is shaming the console players? I love my console 😮

question.content: nothing wrong with consoles haha, they just do what a pc does... but more restricted. I totally get the convenience and the cost, though.

referenced_message.content: Hey who is shaming the console players? I love my console 😮

answer.content: I don't know. Playing a PC while sitting on a couch on a large screen TV has always been tough for me.
